RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT contract_ref_no, latest_version_no, product_code, counterparty, product_type FROM OLTB_CONTRACT WHERE MODULE_CODE = 'LB' AND PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('C','L') AND CONTRACT_STATUS NOT IN ('L', 'V') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLVW_AVL_PROD_BR_USR C, OLVW_USER_PRODUCTS S WHERE S.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND S.PRODUCT_CODE = C.PRODUCT_CODE AND OLTB_CONTRACT.PRODUCT_CODE = C.PRODUCT_CODE AND OLTB_CONTRACT.BRANCH = C.BRANCH_CODE AND S.USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID) ORDER BY CONTRACT_REF_NO

SELECT vw.ccy_code, ccy.ccy_name FROM OLVWS_PRODUCT_CURRENCIES vw, cytms_ccy_defn ccy WHERE vw.ccy_code = ccy.ccy_code AND vw.product_code = sypks_utils.get_product(?) AND ccy.record_stat = 'O' and ccy.auth_stat = 'A' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTB_BORR_SETTLE_CURR_DET a WHERE a.currency = ccy.ccy_code AND vw.ccy_code = a.currency AND a.contract_ref_no =? AND a.CUSTOMER_NO = ?) ORDER BY vw.ccy_code

SELECT ssi_mnemonic, settlement_seq_no, counterparty, customer_name1, currency, product_code, module, branch, pay_ac_branch, pay_account, pay_account_ccy, recv_ac_branch, recv_account, recv_account_ccy FROM OLTM_INSTR a, (SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, customer_name1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER UNION ALL SELECT 'ALL', 'ALL CUSTOMERS' FROM DUAL) b WHERE counterparty IN (NVL(?, ?),'ALL') AND a.counterparty = b.CUSTOMER_NO(+) AND Currency IN (?, '*.*') AND branch IN (sypks_utils.get_branch(?), 'ALL') AND module IN (?, 'AL') AND product_code IN (sypks_utils.get_product(?), 'ALL') AND a.record_stat = 'O' AND a.auth_stat = 'A' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM olvws_PROD_ACNT_Access X WHERE (PAY_ACCOUNT = X.AC_GL_NO or RECV_ACCOUNT = X.AC_GL_NO) AND X.PRODUCT_CODE = ?)

SELECT b.entity, b.entity_name, b.entity_type FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY a, OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_DETAILS b WHERE a.customer_no = ? AND a.record_stat = 'O' AND a.auth_stat = 'A' AND b.customer_no = a.customer_no AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM lbtb_borrower_entities c WHERE contract_ref_no = ? AND version_no = ? AND customer_no = ? AND c.entity = b.entity AND ('XX' = NVL((SELECT PRODUCT_TYPE FROM oltbs_contract_master l WHERE contract_Ref_no = ? AND VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = l.contract_ref_no)), 'XX') OR drawdown_no = NVL((SELECT DRAWDOWN_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER a WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO)), 0)))

RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_MULTIBRN_WHERECLAUSE: Branch IN (SELECT BRANCH_CODE FROM SMVW_USER_BRANCHES WHERE USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID INTERSECT SELECT BRANCH_CODE FROM SMTB_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID UNION SELECT BRANCH_CODE FROM SMVWS_USER_CENTRAL_ROLES WHERE USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID)

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT distinct A.counterparty,A.CUST_NAME FROM LBVW_AMND_SETT_SUMMARY A ORDER BY A.counterparty
